Package com.rift.coad.lib.security.login

Interface Summary
LoginHandler This is the interface that processes the login request for a given user store.
LoginInfoHandler This interface will be responsible for suppling the login handler with the information required to perform the login.
LoginModule The login manager is responsible for suppling the login methods for the user store object.
 

Class Summary
AuthTypes This file contains the standard recognised authentication types.
AuthValues This class defines all the constants for authentication parameters.
LoginManager This class is responsible for managing the login requests initiated by users.
SessionLogin This class is responsible for setting up a session for a user.
 

Exception Summary
AuthenticationException This exception will be thrown when an authentication request fails.
LoginException The login exception generated by the login related classes and interfaces.
